pullRequest.title: Fortune cookies
pullRequest.bodyText:
a few more quotes for fortune cookies
Description
Added a few quotes to fortune cookies to pull from
Changes
6 new lines of dialogue for Fortune cookies
Related Issues
None
Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

commit.message:
Fortune cookies

a few more quotes for fortune cookies

nodes.bodyText: You need to "escape" the single quote. So, do '' (two back to back)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -155,6 +155,12 @@ messages:
   - '&742. The answer is 42.'
   - '&7A Walshy a day will keep the troubles away.'
   - '&7Never dig straight down!'
+  - '&7Tis but a flesh wound!'
+  - '&7I'm &4NOT &7the Messiah!'

commit.message:
Fortune Cookies Fix #1

I have "escaped" the single quote issue

nodes.bodyText: I would probably not include this one.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -155,6 +155,12 @@ messages:
   - '&742. The answer is 42.'
   - '&7A Walshy a day will keep the troubles away.'
   - '&7Never dig straight down!'
+  - '&7Tis but a flesh wound!'
+  - '&7I am &4NOT &7the Messiah!'
+  - '&7Always look on the bright side of life!'
+  - '&7African or European Swallow?'

   - '&742. The answer is 42.'
   - '&7A Walshy a day will keep the troubles away.'
   - '&7Never dig straight down!'
